        public Definition put(java.lang.String key,
                      Definition value,
                      RandomDrop.Tier dropTier)
        Add a word to the lexicon with a tier rarity for random drops.
        Parameters:
        key - The vocab item to add.
        value - The semantics of the vocab item.
        dropTier - The Tier in which the item should drop.
        Returns:
        The added item.

      • put

                      Definition value,
                      RandomDrop.Tier[] dropTiers)
        Add a word to the lexicon with a list of several drop tiers.
        Parameters:
        key - The vocab item to add.
        value - The semantics of the vocab item.
        dropTier - An array of Tiers in which this element should drop.
        Returns:
        The added item.
